description.zh-cn: 中国东周第二十代国王，姓姬，名午。
description.en: The 20th king of the Eastern Zhou dynasty in China, with the surname Ji and given name Wu.

description.zh-cn: 东周国王，周威烈王之父。
description.en: King of the Eastern Zhou dynasty, father of King Weilie of Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继西周之后的朝代。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty that followed the Western Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 东周国王，周威烈王之子。
description.en: King of the Eastern Zhou dynasty, son of King Weilie of Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期韩国的开国君主，原为晋国大夫。
description.en: The founding monarch of the State of Han during the Warring States period, originally a minister of the State of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期赵国的开国君主，原为晋国大夫。
description.en: The founding monarch of the State of Zhao during the Warring States period, originally a minister of the State of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期魏国的开国君主，原为晋国大夫。
description.en: The founding monarch of the State of Wei during the Warring States period, originally a minister of the State of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 春秋末期晋国执政大臣。
description.en: A ruling minister of the State of Jin during the late Spring and Autumn period.

description.zh-cn: 周朝的诸侯国之一，后被韩、赵、魏三家瓜分。
description.en: A vassal state of the Zhou dynasty, later partitioned by the states of Han, Zhao, and Wei.

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋末年，晋国被韩、赵、魏三家瓜分的事件，标志着战国时代的开始。
description.en: The event at the end of the Spring and Autumn period where the State of Jin was divided among the states of Han, Zhao, and Wei, marking the beginning of the Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个时期，始于平王东迁，终于三家分晋或战国起始。
description.en: A period in Chinese history, beginning with King Ping's move to the east and ending with the Partition of Jin or the start of the Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继春秋时代之后的一个时期，始于三家分晋，终于秦统一六国。
description.en: A period in Chinese history following the Spring and Autumn period, beginning with the Partition of Jin and ending with the unification of China by Qin.

description.zh-cn: 中国北宋时期的政治家及史学家，编纂了《资治通鉴》。
description.en: A politician and historian of the Northern Song dynasty in China, who compiled the Zizhi Tongjian.

description.zh-cn: 由司马光主编的一部中国编年体史书，记事始于三家分晋。
description.en: A pioneering reference work in Chinese historiography, published in the form of a chronicle and edited by Sima Guang, which begins its account with the Partition of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 中国河南省下辖的地级市，周威烈王的安葬地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Henan Province, China, and the burial place of King Weilie of Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 东周国王，周考王之父。
description.en: King of the Eastern Zhou dynasty, father of King Kao of Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 东周国王，周贞定王之父。
description.en: King of the Eastern Zhou dynasty, father of King Zhending of Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继商朝之后的朝代，分为西周与东周两个时期。
description.en: The dynasty in Chinese history that followed the Shang dynasty, divided into the Western Zhou and Eastern Zhou periods.

description.zh-cn: 周威烈王是周考王之子。
description.en: King Weilie of Zhou was the son of King Kao of Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 周安王是周威烈王之子。
description.en: King An of Zhou was the son of King Weilie of Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 周考王是周贞定王之子。
description.en: King Kao of Zhou was the son of King Zhending of Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 周贞定王是周元王之子。
description.en: King Zhending of Zhou was the son of King Yuan of Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 周威烈王于公元前425年至公元前402年在位，是东周第二十代国王。
description.en: King Weilie of Zhou reigned from 425 BC to 402 BC as the 20th king of the Eastern Zhou dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 在三家分晋前，韩虔是晋国的大夫。
description.en: Before the Partition of Jin, Han Qian was a Grand Master of the State of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 在三家分晋前，赵籍是晋国的大夫。
description.en: Before the Partition of Jin, Zhao Ji was a Grand Master of the State of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 在三家分晋前，魏斯是晋国的大夫。
description.en: Before the Partition of Jin, Wei Si was a Grand Master of the State of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 韩虔与赵籍、魏斯联合击败了晋国执政大臣智伯。
description.en: Han Qian, along with Zhao Ji and Wei Si, jointly defeated Zhi Bo, the ruling minister of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 赵籍与韩虔、魏斯联合击败了晋国执政大臣智伯。
description.en: Zhao Ji, along with Han Qian and Wei Si, jointly defeated Zhi Bo, the ruling minister of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 魏斯与韩虔、赵籍联合击败了晋国执政大臣智伯。
description.en: Wei Si, along with Han Qian and Zhao Ji, jointly defeated Zhi Bo, the ruling minister of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 周威烈王二十三年（公元前403年），册封晋国大夫韩虔为韩侯，正式承认其诸侯地位。
description.en: In the 23rd year of his reign (403 BC), King Weilie of Zhou enfeoffed Han Qian, a grand master of Jin, as Marquess of Han, officially recognizing his status as a feudal lord.

description.zh-cn: 周威烈王二十三年（公元前403年），册封晋国大夫赵籍为赵侯，正式承认其诸侯地位。
description.en: In the 23rd year of his reign (403 BC), King Weilie of Zhou enfeoffed Zhao Ji, a grand master of Jin, as Marquess of Zhao, officially recognizing his status as a feudal lord.

description.zh-cn: 周威烈王二十三年（公元前403年），册封晋国大夫魏斯为魏侯，正式承认其诸侯地位。
description.en: In the 23rd year of his reign (403 BC), King Weilie of Zhou enfeoffed Wei Si, a grand master of Jin, as Marquess of Wei, officially recognizing his status as a feudal lord.

description.zh-cn: 三家分晋事件导致晋国被韩、赵、魏三家瓜分，最终灭亡。
description.en: The Partition of Jin event led to the division of the State of Jin by the three families of Han, Zhao, and Wei, ultimately leading to its demise.

description.zh-cn: 三家分晋事件标志着春秋时代的结束。
description.en: The Partition of Jin marks the end of the Spring and Autumn period.

description.zh-cn: 三家分晋事件标志着战国时代的来临。
description.en: The Partition of Jin marks the beginning of the Warring States period.

description.zh-cn: 司马光的《资治通鉴》以三家分晋（公元前403年）作为其历史记述的起点。
description.en: Sima Guang's Zizhi Tongjian begins its historical narrative with the Partition of Jin (403 BC).

description.zh-cn: 司马光在《资治通鉴》的开篇就三家分晋事件发表了长篇的评论。
description.en: Sima Guang offered a lengthy commentary on the Partition of Jin at the beginning of his Zizhi Tongjian.

description.zh-cn: 周威烈王于公元前402年逝世，安葬于今河南省洛阳市。
description.en: King Weilie of Zhou died in 402 BC and was buried in what is now Luoyang City, Henan Province.
